description:
Blitzle, known as the Electrified Pokémon, is a zebra-like Pokémon. Its mane shines when it discharges electricity. It communicates with its comrades by the light of its mane. It appears when the sky is obscured by thunderclouds. It uses its mane to catch lightning and store the electricity.
Game Informer`s Jeff Marchiafava stated, "Something about Blitzle seems like it`s trying too hard."
name: Shimama
